title: Tech holds H-STEM groundbreaking | News, Sports, Jobs - Daily Mining Gazette
content: Tech holds H-STEM groundbreaking | News, Sports, Jobs  Daily Mining Gazette
description: HOUGHTON — Michigan Technological University administrators and legislators dug in shovels Friday for the groundbreaking of the new H-STEM Engineering and Health Technologies Complex. It will be the first new building on Tech’s campus since the Great Lakes Research Center, which the university broke ground on in 2010. It heralds “a new time of growth […]
